scripts.start:legacy: concurrently "cd node-remote && pnpm start:legacy" "cd ./node-local-remote && pnpm start:legacy" "cd ./node-host && sleep 5; pnpm start:legacy"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd node-remote && pnpm start" "cd ./node-local-remote && pnpm start" "cd ./node-host && sleep 5; pnpm start"
